<Text: Kookaburra Kahuna:  This led to the Marylebone Cricket Club, the copyright holder to the laws of cricket, ruling the bat ineligible for use in international test matches.>

Text: Kookaburra Kahuna:  Its use is still permitted in all other forms of cricket, making it a bat which dominates the vast majority of others.
